title: My Pixel 4 Screen turns on and off throughout the night when connected to the Pixel Stand
content:
I am having issues with my Pixel 4 screen turning on and off when connected to the Pixel Stand.
It happens every minute or so when the lights are off at night.
I have:
-Reconnected to the stand
-Shut down Motion Sense 
-Shut down Ambient Display
-Set "Screen off when dark" to on
-Set "DnD while docked" to on
-Turned off "Sunrise Alarm"

Any help/suggestions are appreciated!
